experience.title: Software Developer
info: Responsible for web team front-end development and design
Evalute all new tools and performs tests on all new and update modules.
Perform regular analysis on all process activities.
Produce clean, efficient code based on specifications.

experience.title: Sr. Software Developer
info: Worked closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, QA engineers, and business stakeholders, to ensure successful project delivery.
Provided technical leadership, conducted code reviews, and mentored junior developers to ensure quality and team growth.
Led and mentored a team of front-end developers, fostering growth and knowledge sharing, while ensuring timely and high-quality project deliveries.
Team Management along with Sprint & Release plans.
